entry.def: Surf is the mass of white bubbles that is formed by waves as they fall upon the shore.
If you surf, you ride on big waves in the sea on a special board.

example.ex: I'm going to buy a surfboard and learn to surf...
example.tran: 我要买个冲浪板学习冲浪。

example.ex: I'm going to be surfing bigger waves when I get to Australia!
example.tran: 到了澳大利亚后我要去浪头更大的地方冲浪！

entry.def: If you surf the Internet, you spend time finding and looking at things on the Internet.

example.ex: No one knows how many people currently surf the Net.
example.tran: 没人知道现在有多少人在网上冲浪。

Sentence.sentence: Many more people in the States are spending their free time surfing the Web, e- mafling friends or playing games online.
Many cell phones allow users to surf the Web, but only some newer ones are capable of wireless connection to the local area computer network.
